attributes.action: Imminent funding threat at Sheltered Housing sites
attributes.additional_details:
That the Government should not cut funding to Ealing council's 'Supporting People' budget which provides sheltered housing residents with on site 'Warden' and essential one to one care, physical, mental and practical support. If central government funding has already been taken away we then request that Ealing Council maintain the full current services for the A2Dominion sites.
2 November 2011 is that last date for Ealing Council to recieve views and representations.
Representations can be posted to:
Supporting People Team,
Third Floor Orange,
Perceval House,
Uxbridge Road,
Ealing,
London W5 2HL
or e-mail: spteam@ealing.gov.uk.
The final decision about the Council funding of this service will be made by 31 December 2011 and take effect on 31st March 2012.
